spirit:component.spirit:name: logicvc

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: vid_io_ts
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Xylon parallel video output interface with three-stated signals

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: vid_io
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Xilinx parallel video output interface without three-stated signals

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_MEM_BURST
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Available values are 16, 32 and 64.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_MEM_BYTE_SWAP
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:displayName: Swap bytes for logiCVC memory access
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: If set this will change byte ordering on memory interface bus (B0B1B2B3 => B3B2B1B0 for 32-bit memory interface data bus width, B0B1B2B3B4B5B6B7 => B7B6B5B4B3B2B1B0 for 64-bit memory interface data bus width).

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_MEM_LITTLE_ENDIAN
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Default endianness for logiCVC memory access is little.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_INCREASE_FIFO
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: User can choose to increase the size of each layer FIFO at the expense of bigger BRAM utilization.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_M_AXI_THREAD_ID_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: AXI4 interface thread ID width.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_M_AXI_DATA_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: AXI4 interface data bus width.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_M_AXI_ADDR_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: AXI4 interface address bus width.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_REGS_INTERFACE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:displayName: Use AXI4-Lite to access logiCVC registers

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_READABLE_REGS
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: To save additional resources user can disable the read register interface. In this mode only interrupt status register, double/triple video/CLUT buffer registers, power control register and IP version register are readable.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_REG_BYTE_SWAP
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:displayName: Swap bytes for logiCVC register access
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: If set this will change byte ordering on register interface bus (B0B1B2B3 => B3B2B1B0).

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_S_AXI_ADDR_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: AXI4-Lite interface address bus width.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_S_AXI_DATA_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: AXI4-Lite interface data bus width.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_PIXEL_DATA_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Parallel pixel data width towards the display - bits per pixel (bpp).

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_USE_VCLK2
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:displayName: Use vclk2 for DDR pixel data output
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Pixel clock rising edge is set in the middle of the DDR RGB data eye, or if not used, synchronous.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_ROW_STRIDE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Distance between same column pixels for adjacent rows in pixels.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_XCOLOR
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Enable pixel dithering functionality.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_USE_SIZE_POSITION
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Enable functionality of configurable layer size and position.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_DISPLAY_INTERFACE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Enable different output types. Parallel output is always active.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_DISPLAY_COLOR_SPACE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Select output color space and format.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LVDS_DATA_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Data width of the LVDS display interface type.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_VCLK_PERIOD
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:displayName: VCLK clock period defined in ps
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: VCLK period in ps when DVI display interface type is implemented.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_NUM_OF_LAYERS
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Number of logiCVC layers to be instantiated.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_0_TYPE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Select between RGB or YCbCr layer.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_1_TYPE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Select between RGB, YCbCr or alpha layer.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_2_TYPE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Select between RGB or YCbCr layer.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_3_TYPE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Select between RGB, YCbCr or alpha layer.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_4_TYPE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Select between RGB or YCbCr layer.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_0_DATA_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Select between 8, 16 or 24 data bits per pixel. For RGB layer, 24 represents an RGB 888 format, 16 represents RGB 565 format, while 8 can represent either RGB 332 or CLUT format, depending on layer alpha mode selection. For YCbCr layer, 24 represents an YCbCr 888 (4:4:4) format and 16 represents an YCb YCr 88 88 (4:2:2) format.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_1_DATA_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Select between 8, 16 or 24 data bits per pixel. For RGB layer, 24 represents an RGB 888 format, 16 represents RGB 565 format, while 8 can represent either RGB 332 or CLUT format, depending on layer alpha mode selection. For YCbCr layer, 24 represents an YCbCr 888 (4:4:4) format and 16 represents an YCb YCr 88 88 (4:2:2) format.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_2_DATA_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Select between 8, 16 or 24 data bits per pixel. For RGB layer, 24 represents an RGB 888 format, 16 represents RGB 565 format, while 8 can represent either RGB 332 or CLUT format, depending on layer alpha mode selection. For YCbCr layer, 24 represents an YCbCr 888 (4:4:4) format and 16 represents an YCb YCr 88 88 (4:2:2) format.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_3_DATA_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Select between 8, 16 or 24 data bits per pixel. For RGB layer, 24 represents an RGB 888 format, 16 represents RGB 565 format, while 8 can represent either RGB 332 or CLUT format, depending on layer alpha mode selection. For YCbCr layer, 24 represents an YCbCr 888 (4:4:4) format and 16 represents an YCb YCr 88 88 (4:2:2) format.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_4_DATA_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Select between 8, 16 or 24 data bits per pixel. For RGB layer, 24 represents an RGB 888 format, 16 represents RGB 565 format, while 8 can represent either RGB 332 or CLUT format, depending on layer alpha mode selection. For YCbCr layer, 24 represents an YCbCr 888 (4:4:4) format and 16 represents an YCb YCr 88 88 (4:2:2) format.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_0_ALPHA_MODE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Select between layer alpha, pixel alpha or CLUT alpha blending mode.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_1_ALPHA_MODE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Select between layer alpha, pixel alpha or CLUT alpha blending mode.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_2_ALPHA_MODE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Select between layer alpha, pixel alpha or CLUT alpha blending mode.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_3_ALPHA_MODE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Select between layer alpha, pixel alpha or CLUT alpha blending mode.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_4_ALPHA_MODE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Select between layer alpha, pixel alpha or CLUT alpha blending mode.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_USE_BACKGROUND
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: In case the last layer is configured as background, pixel value is read from logiCVC background color register and not from video memory buffer.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_USE_XTREME_DSP
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Enable or disable the use of DSP resources for blender.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_USE_MULTIPLIER
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:displayName: Type of multiplier used in blender
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Control the way in which multipliers in blender are implemented: 0 - LUT, 1 - block, 2 - auto.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_0_ADDR
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: This value can be overriden runtime using layer memory address register. Please consult the logiCVC users manual for proper address assignment.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_1_ADDR
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: This value can be overriden runtime using layer memory address register. Please consult the logiCVC users manual for proper address assignment.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_2_ADDR
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: This value can be overriden runtime using layer memory address register. Please consult the logiCVC users manual for proper address assignment.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_3_ADDR
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: This value can be overriden runtime using layer memory address register. Please consult the logiCVC users manual for proper address assignment.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_LAYER_4_ADDR
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: This value can be overriden runtime using layer memory address register. Please consult the logiCVC users manual for proper address assignment.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_BUFFER_0_OFFSET
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Only used with external double/triple buffer switching. Double buffer address offset relative to layer address represented in number of lines where each line can have different size. For example 1KB for 8bpp and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024, 2KB for 16bpp and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024 and 4KB for 24bpp layer and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024 and 8KB for 24bpp layer and C_ROW_STRIDE=2048. Triple buffer address offset is defined as double the double buffer offset.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_BUFFER_1_OFFSET
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Only used with external double/triple buffer switching. Double buffer address offset relative to layer address represented in number of lines where each line can have different size. For example 1KB for 8bpp and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024, 2KB for 16bpp and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024 and 4KB for 24bpp layer and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024 and 8KB for 24bpp layer and C_ROW_STRIDE=2048. Triple buffer address offset is defined as double the double buffer offset.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_BUFFER_2_OFFSET
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Only used with external double/triple buffer switching. Double buffer address offset relative to layer address represented in number of lines where each line can have different size. For example 1KB for 8bpp and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024, 2KB for 16bpp and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024 and 4KB for 24bpp layer and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024 and 8KB for 24bpp layer and C_ROW_STRIDE=2048. Triple buffer address offset is defined as double the double buffer offset.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_BUFFER_3_OFFSET
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Only used with external double/triple buffer switching. Double buffer address offset relative to layer address represented in number of lines where each line can have different size. For example 1KB for 8bpp and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024, 2KB for 16bpp and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024 and 4KB for 24bpp layer and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024 and 8KB for 24bpp layer and C_ROW_STRIDE=2048. Triple buffer address offset is defined as double the double buffer offset.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_BUFFER_4_OFFSET
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Only used with external double/triple buffer switching. Double buffer address offset relative to layer address represented in number of lines where each line can have different size. For example 1KB for 8bpp and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024, 2KB for 16bpp and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024 and 4KB for 24bpp layer and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024 and 8KB for 24bpp layer and C_ROW_STRIDE=2048. Triple buffer address offset is defined as double the double buffer offset.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_USE_E_PARALLEL_INPUT
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Syncronize logiCVC to external parallel input and use data as one of the layers.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_USE_E_VCLK_BUFGMUX
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:displayName: Use BUFGMUX for external parallel input
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Use BUFGMUX for switching clock for external parallel input synchronization.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_E_LAYER
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:displayName: Route external parallel input to layer
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Which layer should be used as external parallel stream.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_E_DATA_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: External parallel input data width.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_DVI_CLK_MODE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Valid only for 7-series FPGA devices. Please consult the logiCVC-ML user's manual for more information on selecting the appropriate mode.

spirit:component.spirit:description: The logiCVC-ML IP core is an advanced display graphic controller that enables an easy video and graphics integration into embedded systems with the Xilinx Zynq-7000 AP SoC and FPGAs. It can be used as a standalone graphics IP core, or as a part of larger graphics systems along other Xylon logicBRICKS IP cores. The logiCVC-ML is a real plug-and-play IP core, supported by the Xilinx Vivado IP Integrator (IPI) integrated software solution, and designers familiar with this tool can immediately start designing. The IP's size and feature set can be easily adjusted through IP drag and drop IPI interface. The logiCVC-ML comes readya-to-use and with rich set of deliverables including SW driver, documentation and an example design. Higher resolutions are available on request. Currently Xylon offers software drivers for use with Linux, Android and Microsoft Windows Embedded Compact operating systems.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_ENABLE_THREE_STATE_CONTROL
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Three-state control signals include power sequence control and three-stated parallel video interface.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_USE_GPIO
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Use 5-bit general purpose input and output.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_USE_EXT_BUFFERING
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Enables/disables ports used for external control of frame buffering.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_E_DATA_WIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: External parallel input data width.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_E_LAYER
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Route external parallel input to layer
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Which layer should be used as external parallel stream.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_USE_E_VCLK_BUFGMUX
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Use BUFGMUX for external parallel input
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Use BUFGMUX for switching clock for external parallel input synchronization.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_USE_E_PARALLEL_INPUT
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Syncronize logiCVC to external parallel input and use data as one of the layers.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_BUFFER_4_OFFSET
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Only used with external double/triple buffer switching. Double buffer address offset relative to layer address represented in number of lines where each line can have different size. For example 1KB for 8bpp and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024, 2KB for 16bpp and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024 and 4KB for 24bpp layer and C_ROW_STRIDE=1024 and 8KB for 24bpp layer and C_ROW_STRIDE=2048. Triple buffer address offset is defined as double the double buffer offset.
